QuestData.Title: Free the Captives
QuestData.Description: They've got a bunch of our people in there. I know that they're doing strange rituals to them. It looks like they're sucking the life force right out of them!$B$BYou have to go into the village and free the captives before it's too late!
QuestData.CompletionText: Can you free a few more, please?
QuestData.RewardText: Great job, but that's not even half of the hostages that they took from town.$B$BDarn it all! They must have taken the rest of the captives to their other villages up in the volcano!
